idea-plugin.name: Ataman
idea-plugin.description:
Ataman is a plugin for adding a spacemacs-style leader-based keybindings. This plugin adds two actions to open a spacemacs-style leader menu. Great for users of IdeaVim!
  • LeaderAction can be used to access leader menu everywhere
  • TransparentLeaderAction triggers only when no editable text is focused
      • If you want to use modifier-base shortcut like C-c, just assign LeaderAction to it. If you want to use SPACE as leader, install IdeaVim plugin and set SPACE as a shortcut for TransparentLeaderAction and add `:nnoremap :action LeaderAction` to your ~/.ideavimrc file. This way SPACE will work as a leader unless you are entering some text anywhere More info and examples can be found at the plugin's GitHub.

action.description: Show bindings menu from leader key
Bind this action to skip clicking in editable windows
Attempts to read ~/.atamanrc.config and parse bindings from it
